mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ugotfilm_notice_comment where pnum = #{pnum}
select b.*, u.nickname from( select * from ugotfilm_notice_comment where pnum = #{pnum} order by num asc) b left join ugotfilm_user u on b.writer=u.usercode order by num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ugotfilm_notice_comment(pnum, num, writer, reg_date, subject, ip) VALUES(#{pnum}, ugotfilm_notice_comment_seq.nextval, #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate, #{subject, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE ugotfilm_notice_comment SET re_step = re_step + 1 WHERE ref=#{ref} AND re_step > #{re_step}
